column1: I just found a new job as a window cleaner recently
column2: it’s surprisingly satisfying! Even though it’s tiring
column3: it’s fulfilling. I might get tired of it after a while
column4: but I’m happy with it for the moment being. Can you think of a job I would struggle at?

column1: I’ve never been an artsy person
column2: I’m more of a physical person
column3: so I’m sure it’d be indeed pretty hard for me

column1: I did that job multiple times already
column2: wouldn’t hurt to do it again.

column1: Taxi driver is a very immobile job which requires lots of attention
column2: I don’t think I could ever do this kind of job.
